ygData.subject: Re: Begging skill
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh no, it gets me killed just fine. =)  I was reading alt.games.everquest the other day.  Someone came up with a great idea for getting your begging skill
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:55 PM 06/02/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Earthlink DBComix" <dbcomix@...>
>
>I believe the begging skill is to get coppers off of npcs, not a very
>effective skill but its there for some reason. I dont think it gets you
>killed though.


Oh no, it gets me killed just fine. =) I was reading alt.games.everquest
the other day. Someone came up with a great idea for getting your begging
skill up - beg from MOBs. They will feakout and attack you just like the
NPCs eventually will with constant begging, but you were going to kill the
MOB anyway.

On the downside, no one who posted had ever gotten any more than a couple
of copper from the NPCs (I don't think the MOBs will give you anything
other than skill advancement). Judging by this, it looks like it may be a
pretty useless skill. Even the lowliest level 1 character can still whack
a bat and sell the wings for 9 copper or so apiece, so why waste the time
trying to convince an NPC you are deserving of his spare change?


-Dan Alexander

>----- Original Message -----
>From: <dalex@...>
>To: <EQFenninRo@onelist.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 8:28 AM
>Subject: [EQFenninRo] Begging skill
>
>
>> From: dalex@...
>>
>> Hi folks. Does the skill "Begging" serve any purpose in the game? Other
>than getting people killed I mean. =)
>>
>> If it doesn't that's fine - I just don't want to wind up in a situation
>where I'm trapped somewhere and have to beg a key off of some NPC.
>>
>> -Dan Alexander
